string-array.name: key 21
string-array.item: 发音人=标准（轩华英式英语) 23

string-array.name: tts_has_set
string-array.item: 1. The current HUD height has been adjusted to Level %s
2. The HUD height is already Level %s
3. This is already Level %s HUD height

string-array.name: tts_is_set_max
string-array.item: 1. OK, adjust to the maximum HUD height
2. Adjusted to the maximum HUD height
3. The HUD height has been adjusted to the maximum

string-array.name: tts_already_set_max
string-array.item: 1. Already at the maximum HUD height
2. This is already the maximum HUD height
3. The current setting is already the maximum HUD height

string-array.name: tts_please_open_function
string-array.item: 1. Please turn on the HUD switch first
2. To set the HUD height, turn on the HUD switch first
3. Sorry, please turn on the HUD first

string-array.name: tts_has_set
string-array.item: 1. The current HUD height has been adjusted to Level %s
2. The HUD height is already Level %s
3. This is already Level %s HUD height

string-array.name: tts_is_set_min
string-array.item: 1. OK, adjust to the minimum HUD height
2. Adjusted to the minimum HUD height
3. The HUD height has been adjusted to the minimum

string-array.name: tts_already_set_min
string-array.item: 1. Already at the minimum HUD height
2. This is already the minimum HUD height
3. The current setting is already the minimum HUD height

string-array.name: tts_please_open_function
string-array.item: 1. Please turn on the HUD switch first
2. To set the HUD height, turn on the HUD switch first
3. Sorry, please turn on the HUD first
